items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between contacts.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Sent messages appear in the sender's chat window immediately
Received messages trigger a notification for the recipient

items.title: Video Calling
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start a video call from an active chat
Video and audio streams connect within 3 seconds of call initiation
Call quality maintains at least 720p resolution with minimal lag under normal network conditions
non_functional: End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams
Support for at least 1,000 concurrent video calls

notes: Assumed that the application will support one-to-one messaging and video calls initially; group chat and group video calls are not specified.
